item.title: BMO 领导的集团寻求为 HIG 的 Converge 收购案甩掉沉重债务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，以蒙特利尔银行（Bank of Montreal）为首的一批银行正在寻求重新启动一项贷款，支持 HIG Capital 收购 Converge Technology Solutions Corp.【原文：A group of banks led by Bank of Montreal are looking to relaunch a loan supporting HIG Capital’s buyout of Converge Technology Solutions Corp., according to people with knowledge of the matter, four months after banks were forced to fund the deal when tariffs upended markets.】

item.title: 英伟达业绩公布前亚洲股市将反弹：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市有望从周二的跌势中反弹，追随美股在英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统推动美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）下台后，美元和较长期国债下跌。【原文：Asian equities are poised to rebound from Tuesday’s losses, tracking modest gains in US stocks ahead of Nvidia Corp.’s results. The dollar and longer-dated Treasuries declined following President Donald Trump’s push to oust Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook.】

item.title: 美国采取行动后，委内瑞拉将向石油输出枢纽部署船只
item.description: 委内瑞拉将在哥伦比亚附近的一个重要石油出口中心部署船只，以回应美国向加勒比海南部派遣军舰的决定。【原文：Venezuela will deploy vessels to a key oil-exporting hub near Colombia in response to the US’s decision to send warships to the southern Caribbean.】

item.title: 特朗普征税即将落地，印度准备应对 50%的关税冲击
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）为惩罚新德里购买俄罗斯石油，将从周三开始对部分印度商品征收 50%的高额关税，这是亚洲最高的关税。【原文：The US will slap a crushing 50% tariff on some Indian goods starting Wednesday — the highest in Asia — as President Donald Trump presses ahead with the levies to punish New Delhi for buying Russian oil.】

item.title: 日本央行的操作释放出市场急于抛售债券的信号
item.description: 投资者急于减持日本政府债券，以至于一些投资者愿意以折扣价向中央银行出售这些证券。【原文：Investors are getting so desperate to lighten their holdings of Japanese government bonds that some are willing to sell the securities at a discount to the central bank.】

item.title: 中国新经济带来巨大的股权投资机会：今日中国
item.description: 北京与华盛顿之间的紧张局势加剧，许多投资者正等待将资金投入中国资产。Krane Funds Advisors LLC 首席投资官布兰登-埃亨（Brendan Ahern）最近在其纽约办公室接受采访时，解释了地缘政治和市场变化如何影响资金流入。【原文：Heightened tensions between Beijing and Washington have many investors waiting to allocate capital to Chinese assets. In a recent interview at his New York office, Brendan Ahern, chief investment officer at Krane Funds Advisors LLC, explains how geopolitics and shifting market narratives influence inflows.】

item.title: 中国向非洲出口的速度比其他任何地方都快
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税措施重新划定了世界最大制造业国家的贸易范围，非洲已成为中国出口的新热点。【原文：Africa has become a new hotspot for Chinese exports as Donald Trump’s tariffs redraw trade for the world’s biggest manufacturing nation.】

item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔认为巴西扩张面临进口和关税风险
item.description: 安赛乐米塔尔公司巴西业务主管豪尔赫-奥利维拉（Jorge Oliveira）表示，由于廉价钢铁进口激增和美国关税的影响，该公司在巴西的扩张计划可能会受到限制。【原文：ArcelorMittal SA’s expansion plans in Brazil may be limited due to a surge in cheap steel imports and the effects of US tariffs, said the company’s head of Brazilian operations, Jorge Oliveira.】

item.title: OpenAI计划更新ChatGPT，因青少年自杀遭父母起诉
item.description: OpenAI 正在对其流行的聊天机器人进行修改，因为有诉讼称，今年春天自杀身亡的一名青少年依赖 ChatGPT 作为指导。【原文：OpenAI is making changes to its popular chatbot following a lawsuit alleging that a teenager who died by suicide this spring relied on ChatGPT as a coach.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称埃克森公司与俄罗斯石油公司就重返俄罗斯举行会谈
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》援引知情人士的话报道，埃克森美孚公司与俄罗斯国有石油公司就重返萨哈林一号石油开发项目举行了会谈。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. held talks with Russia’s state-controlled oil company about returning to its Sakhalin-1 oil development, the Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 因担心家庭债务问题，日本央行可能延长按兵不动的时间
item.description: 韩国央行准备在更新经济预测的同时保持政策设定的稳定，因为当局需要权衡房地产市场的繁荣可能助长家庭债务的风险，以及支持受美国关税打击的经济的必要性。【原文：The Bank of Korea is poised to keep its policy settings steady while updating economic forecasts as authorities weigh risks that a frothy housing market could fuel household debt against the need to support an economy hit by US tariffs.】

item.title: 期权交易员认为美国长债表现不佳的空间更大
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）解雇美联储理事的举动加剧了市场对美国央行独立性的担忧，期权交易商加大了对30年期国债将落后于其他美国政府债券的押注。【原文：Options traders boosted bets that 30-year Treasuries will trail other US government bonds as President Donald Trump’s move to fire a Federal Reserve governor intensified concerns around the central bank’s independence.】

item.title: 特朗普与美联储的赌局有可能将关键债券利率推得更高
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统对美联储史无前例、不断升级的攻击有可能适得其反，以更高的长期借贷成本打击金融市场和经济。【原文：President Donald Trump’s unprecedented and escalating attack on the Federal Reserve runs the risk of backfiring by hitting financial markets and the economy with higher long-term borrowing costs.】

item.title: PVH Corp.季度盈利超预期后上调业绩展望
item.description: PVH 公司在第二季度因与名人合作和娱乐交易而实现更强劲的销售后，上调了今年的业绩预期。【原文：PVH Corp. boosted its forecast for the current year following stronger sales in the second quarter on celebrity partnerships and entertainment deals.】

item.title: 特朗普团队权衡扩大美联储银行影响力的方案
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，特朗普政府正在审查对美联储的 12 家地区性银行施加更多影响的方案，其影响范围可能会超出华盛顿的人事任命。【原文：The Trump administration is reviewing options for exerting more influence over the Federal Reserve’s 12 regional banks that would potentially extend its reach beyond personnel appointments in Washington, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 科尔百货寻求更多时间向供应商支付周转资金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，科尔公司（Kohl's Corp.）正在要求一些供应商给予更多的时间结清发票，因为这家陷入困境的零售商正在调整其付款策略，努力实施扭亏为盈计划。【原文：Kohl’s Corp. is asking some vendors for more time to settle invoices, according to people with knowledge of the situation, as the ailing retailer adjusts its payment strategy amid efforts to execute a turnaround plan.】

item.title: 特朗普称已准备好为库克下台而战
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）被指控伪造抵押贷款文件后提出将其赶下台的动议后表示，他已做好与她打官司的准备。【原文：President Donald Trump said he was prepared for a legal fight with Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook after he moved to oust her from her post following allegations that she falsified mortgage documents.】

item.title: 伦敦上市转换有望为 Metlen 带来富时 100 指数席位
item.description: 在伦敦上市不到一个月后，Metlen Energy and Metals Plc 公司即将在英国蓝筹股基准中占据一席之地。【原文：Less than a month after listing its shares in London, Metlen Energy and Metals Plc is on the verge of gaining a place in the UK’s blue-chip stocks benchmark.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）委员约翰逊将于下周离职，使该委员会仅剩一名委员
item.description: 民主党专员克里斯汀-约翰逊（Kristin Johnson）将于 9 月 3 日离开商品期货交易委员会，该机构将由代理主席卡罗琳-范（Caroline Pham）独自领导。【原文：Democratic Commissioner Kristin Johnson will leave the Commodity Futures Trading Commission on Sept. 3, bringing the agency under the sole leadership of Acting Chairman Caroline Pham.】

item.title: 加拿大央行将研究核心通胀措施，保持 2% 的目标
item.description: 加拿大央行计划维持 2% 的通胀目标，但正在研究衡量核心通胀的最佳方法，以及如何将住房成本纳入货币政策决策。【原文：The Bank of Canada plans to keep its 2% inflation target, but is examining the best ways to measure core inflation and how to factor housing costs into its monetary policy decisions.】

item.title: 新月资本筹备 30 亿美元信贷延续基金
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，新月资本集团（Crescent Capital Group）正在向投资者推介一项信贷延续基金，该基金将允许该集团转移先前基金的部分资产。【原文：Crescent Capital Group is pitching a credit continuation fund to investors that will allow it to move some assets from a prior vehicle, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 总统候选人誓言就玻利维亚 140 亿美元债务进行谈判
item.description: 总统候选人豪尔赫-"图托"-基罗加（Jorge "Tuto" Quiroga）打算为玻利维亚 140 亿美元的海外债务争取更好的条件，以稳定饱受短缺和通胀飙升之苦的经济。【原文：Presidential candidate Jorge “Tuto” Quiroga intends to seek better terms on Bolivia’s $14 billion of overseas debt to stabilize an economy ravaged by shortages and soaring inflation.】

item.title: 对冲基金正在以 2022 年以来从未有过的速度做空 VIX 指数
item.description: 波动性已经消失。现在，对冲基金押注这种平静会持续下去，以三年来从未见过的速度做空 Cboe 波动率指数（VIX）。但从历史上看，这种诡异的平静和极端的定位预示着动荡和股票损失的激增。【原文：Volatility has vanished. Now hedge funds are betting the calm will last, shorting the Cboe Volatility Index, or VIX, at rates not seen in three years. But such eerie calm and extreme positioning has historically foreshadowed a spike in turbulence and stock losses.】

item.title: 预算赤字迫在眉睫，BART 计划出售 9.3 亿美元市政债券
item.description: 加州最大的公共交通系统之一正在利用市政债券市场，以应对联邦援助减少带来的财政悬崖，以及乘客量停留在大流行前一半左右的水平。【原文：One of California’s largest public transit systems is tapping the municipal bond market as it contends with a looming fiscal cliff created by dwindling federal aid and ridership that’s stuck at about half its pre-pandemic level.】

item.title: 特朗普称 Meta 的路易斯安那州数据中心将耗资 500 亿美元
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统说，Meta Platforms 公司计划斥资 500 亿美元在路易斯安那州农村地区建造大型数据中心。【原文：President Donald Trump said that Meta Platforms Inc. is planning to spend $50 billion on its massive data center in rural Louisiana.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴金称其预测利率将小幅调整
item.description: 里士满联邦储备银行行长汤姆-巴金（Tom Barkin）表示，鉴于他预计今年剩余时间内经济活动不会有太大变化，他预测利率调整幅度不会太大。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond President Tom Barkin said his forecast is for a modest adjustment in interest rates given what he expects will be little variation in economic activity over the remainder of the year.】
